title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 530.4 - Service and filing of respondent's brief and appendix
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 530.4 - Service and filing of respondent's brief and appendix

State Regulations

Within 30 days after the service of
petitioner's papers, respondent commission shall file with the clerk of the
court an original and nine copies and shall serve on petitioner three copies of
respondent's brief. At the time respondent commission's brief is filed, respondent may file an original and nine copies, with proof of service of three
copies upon petitioner, of an appendix of record materials not contained in the
record filed by petitioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
530.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
